title: 36 hours in Segovia: Ancient wonders, Medieval charm and Castillian traditions
description: Segovia is the sort of place that takes your breath away - with its iconic Roman aqueduct, impressive gothic cathedral and fairy tale castle all set within a dramatic landscape.

title: From ancient Rome to today, war-makers have talked constantly about peace (Opinion)
description: President Donald Trump has long styled himself as a peacemaker — claiming to have ended eight wars, openly seeking a Nobel Peace Prize and even creating a "Board of Peace" to oversee the ceasefire between Israel and Hamas. But the word “peace” can mean something entirely different when used by those wielding power.

title: Ancient Feminine Wisdom Comes Alive in Bengaluru: Ekaa – The One, a Multi-State Exhibition Arrives with Rare Documentary Screening
description: Bengaluru – Following an overwhelming response in Kochi & Coimbatore, a ground-breaking cultural initiative celebrating India's mystical Yogini tradition reaches Bengaluru this week. The Venkatappa...

title: The lovely walk that takes you through an ancient woodland near Essex
description: The Fir and Ponds Wood walking route takes you through woodland, meadows and is perfect for spotting wildlife

title: Column: Fossil fuels drive our high cost of living
description: Hawaii’s high cost of living isn’t driven only by housing and groceries. Energy costs — especially gasoline and electricity — play a major but often overlooked role. Our dependence on imported fossil fuels keeps prices far above the national average, placing a heavy burden on families across the state.
